description: This file defines a Dart class named Student that models a student entity in a kindergarten management system. It includes member variables, a constructor, a computed property, and methods for serialization and deserialization between Map and class instance.

classes.name: Student
classes.description: A class representing a student with properties such as id, name, guardian details, and class name, including methods to facilitate data mapping between the class and a Map.

methods.name: fullName
methods.description: A getter that returns the student's full name by concatenating firstName and lastName.

methods.name: fromMap
methods.description: A factory constructor that creates a Student instance from a Map<String, dynamic>, allowing for easy deserialization from data sources such as JSON.

methods.name: toMap
methods.description: Converts the Student instance into a Map<String, dynamic>, facilitating serialization to formats like JSON.
